title: Electra Meta Issue
body:
## Description

This issue tracks the main EIPs that are under consideration for the Electra hard fork and are related to the consensus layer. This is not exhaustive and will be updated as the EIP list is finalized. Once the scope of Electra is decided upon, it will then be used to track their progress as they are added to Lighthouse.

## Confirmed EIPs

#### [EIP-6110: Supply Validator Deposits on chain](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6110)
Open Issue -> https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/issues/4330
[Consensus Specs](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/2660af05390aa61f06142e1c6311a3a3c633f720/specs/_features/eip6110)
Requires EL changes: Yes

---

#### [EIP-7002: EL Triggerable Exits](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7002)
Open Issue -> https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/issues/5129
Requires EL changes: Yes

---

#### [EIP-7549: Committee Index Outside Attestation](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7549)
Open Issue -> https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/issues/5130
[Consensus Specs](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/bcead2ff59048dba859c7eb4b62389f0e9168ef8/specs/_features/eip7549/beacon-chain.md)
Requires EL changes: No

---

## Candidate EIPs

#### [EIP-7251 Increase `MAX_EFFECTIVE_BALANCE`](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7251)
Open Issue ->
Requires EL changes: No

---

#### [EIP-7547: Inclusion Lists](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7547)
Open Issue ->
Requires EL changes: Yes

---

#### [EIP-7594: PeerDAS](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8105)
Open Issue ->
Requires EL changes: No

---
